Body:
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/rest/valid_login', body=
    'Service Unavailable', status=503, content_type='text/html')
with pytest.raises(BugsyException) as e:
    Bugsy(username='foo', api_key='goodkey')
assert str(e.value
    ) == 'Message: We received a 503 error with the following: Service Unavailable Code: None'
responses.activate
